team_gold_zork

Class Item

  • java.lang.Object
    • team_gold_zork.Item

  • public class Item
extends java.lang.Object
    This class stores attributes for an item contained within a dungeon

      • Item

        public Item(java.util.Scanner s)
     throws NoItemException
        This constructs an Item object given a scanner reading a bork file.
        Parameters:
        s - the scanner reading the bork file.
        Throws:
        NoItemException - if there are no more items to read from the file.

    • Method Detail

      • setSecondaryName

        private void setSecondaryName()
        This helper method gives an item a secondary name, if the primaryName is in camelCase.

        Returns:
        if the item goes by the given name.

        Gets the message associated with a verb.
        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • transform

        public void transform(Item newItem)
        This method will add a transformed item with a given name to the Dungeon using the ArrayList of transformed items in Dungeon.
        Parameters:
        newItem - the transformed Item to add to the Dungeon.

      • disappear

        public void disappear(Item removedItem)
        This method will remove an already existing item from the dungeon and player's inventory, if needed.
        Parameters:
        removedItem - the item that is being removed
